{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Poké Ball |image = [[File:Poké Ball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Poké Ball''. |price = 100 {{pdollar}} |catchTime = 1.25s |catchRate = 0% |location =
*[[Poké Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Poké Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Poké Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A basic Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it has no catch rate multiplier and catches a Pokémon in 1.25 seconds. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations &
